project.name: digestor
project.purpose: Analyzes complex monorepos using Claude Code's native capabilities to generate comprehensive specs for LLM-assisted code generation

agents.description: Multi-stage analysis workflow executed by Claude Code

stages.name: FileExplorer
stages.responsibility: Discovers and categorizes files/directories, builds initial project map

stages.name: DependencyAnalyzer
stages.responsibility: Maps package dependencies, internal module relationships

stages.name: PatternDetector
stages.responsibility: Identifies architectural patterns, design patterns, conventions

stages.name: CodeResearcher
stages.responsibility: Reviews against best practices, produces improvement suggestions

outputs.purpose: Instruct LLM tools about codebase structure and provide guidance for future code generation

format.patterns.md: Detected architectural patterns and coding conventions
format.manifest.json: Machine-readable index of all specs and metadata
